title: fw_core
description: For spatial search and finding that interesting one

category.title: Category
category.description: A descriptive tag for narrowing the search: cafe, museum, etc.

geometry.title: Geometrical form of the POI
geometry.description: Format: Open Geospatial Consortium's 'Well-known text' ISO/IEC 13249-3:2011

short_name.title: Short name
short_name.description: Short name (max. 31 chars) to be shown on the map or in a narrow list

label.title: Label
label.description: More info to complement the name, if enough space

description.title: Description
description.description: Text to facilitate decision to be interested or not

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: Link to a small picture to be shown on a list, scene or map. Preferably max. 256x256 pixels, e.g. 120x160.

url.title: Web address
url.description: URL to get more info, preferably official website of the POI

last_update.title: Last update
last_update.description: DO NOT EDIT! Information to identify the version of the data component.
